Name: Astral_a20
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 13+ AND MEV v5.4. Recommended VEA. Astral, shortened as AS, is a spin off of 6x2EX and the dial-down version of Celestial with some interesting twists on modded enemies.
    Alpha 20
  - Changed Electric Praetorian ED into Fire Praetorian from MEV, retaining all stats previously. DifficultyRating 70 -> 50. MaxSpawnCount 0/0/1 -> 0. They have added spawnspread of 3500 during Defend. No longer spawns during encounters in 1p setting.
  - Cave Leech: Changed TimeDilation (used to make faster leech) into CaveLeech control. This way they won't inherit the VEA's leech buff. At the same time, Leech speed: x1.25/1.5625 (old speed combined with VEA) -> x1/1.3.
  - Deliverer: Changed TimeDilation into Grabber control.
  - Big Shredder: HealthMultiplier x12.8205 -> x10/10.8/11.6/12.8205 (Scaled with player count). Increased Freeze temperature to -200. Fixed AttackDamageMultiplier not working. DifficultyRating 85 -> 90.
  - Elimination mission type: Sentinels from Hiveguard spawn now have the correct stats applied from the one spawns in normal pool. At 1p setting, all Dreadnought types can be lit on fire, and has slightly increased DamageMultiplier and significantly increased FireDamageMultiplier.
  - Stingtail: Banned in Solo. Rarity increase 5.5 -> x/6.375/5.75.
  - Stalker: Banned in Solo. Now use Vanilla Stalker model instead of Beta, AttackDamageMultiplier 1 -> 0.5 (Because they are more OP than Beta Stalker).
  - Normal and Ice Bulk: If playing as Driller or Scout in Solo, Base HP 1 -> 0.6584.
  - Shellback, Youngling: Banned during Drillevator section in Solo.
  - EnemyWaveInterval: At 1p setting, on Deep Scan mission type. Add 40s interval into the value. On Refinery, remove 90 bin, after 200s of timer passed, wave timer switches to 240s bin to allow you to gather resources, build pipes and clear the remaining room.
  - EnemyNormalWaveInterval: At 1p setting, on Salvage, Sabotage, Escort mission type, add 30s interval into remaining bins. On Salvage, after finishing mules but uplink hasn't started and finishing uplink but refill hasn't started, switches to 240s bin to allow you to have time to gather resources and terraform the holding spot.
  - Stationary and Encounter Difficulty: At 1p setting, value lowered by 10%, 25% if on Big room type mission (Salvage, Deep Scan, Refinery, PE, Elimination). As exchange, Normal Wave Difficulty is slightly increased. 
  - Deep Scan: At 1p setting, when it's not a swarm, Encounters and Drillevator, ECM is slightly reduced.
  - Barrager: At 1p setting, on Refinery, DifficultyRating increases +150.
  - Exploder: At 1p and PE or Deep Scan mission type, in the first 60s of mission, Exploders cannot be spawned.
